60% increased Mana Regeneration Rate

socketedItems.secDescrText: Engulfs you in magical fire that rapidly burns you and nearby enemies. Your spell damage is substantially increased while under this effect. The effect ends when you have 1 life remaining.
explicitMods: Deals 70% of your Maximum Life as Base Fire Damage per second
Deals 70% of your Maximum Energy Shield as Base Fire Damage per second
You Burn for 90% of your Maximum Life per second as Fire Damage
You Burn for 70% of your Maximum Energy Shield per second as Fire Damage
Grants 39% more Spell Damage
Base radius is 2.3 metres
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell will track how much mana you spend on it, granting a buff when the total mana spent reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, mines or skills with a reservation.
explicitMods:
Gain Arcane Surge after Spending a total of 400 Mana on
Upfront Costs and Effects of a Supported Skill

Arcane Surge grants 20% increased Cast Speed
Arcane Surge grants 58% increased Mana Regeneration rate
Arcane Surge lasts 4 seconds
Supported Skills deal 25% more Spell Damage while you have Arcane Surge

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, making them more vulnerable to Critical Strikes. Killing the cursed enemy will grant life and mana, and a power charge. You can only have one Mark at a time.

But I did not do it for power.
And I'd do it again in an instant.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that protects the lower half of your life, preventing some of the immediate life loss when damaged by hits and applying the loss over time instead. Life Recovery other than Flasks cannot Recover Life to above Low Life
